entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Wingham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:04 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls late this morning. Blowing snow this afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this morning. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy and snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
